question.title: Question
question.description: What is the PR semiology of thoracic distension?

option_a.title: Option A
option_a.description: Hyperinflation of the lung fields with elevation of the diaphragmatic cupolas and verticalization of the ribs.

option_b.title: Option B
option_b.description: Hyperclarity of the lung fields with flattening of the diaphragmatic cupolas and horizontalization of the ribs.

option_c.title: Option C
option_c.description: Hyperinflation of the lung fields with flattening of the diaphragmatic cupolas and verticalization of the ribs.

option_d.title: Option D
option_d.description: Hyperclarity of the lung fields with elevation of the diaphragmatic cupolas and horizontalization of the ribs.
